title: AI in K-12 Education: Current Practices and Future Trends
description: This study examines the current implementation of AI tools in K-12 classrooms across the United States. It highlights best practices, challenges, and provides recommendations for educators and administrators.
categories: Current AI Use and Perceptions in PK 12 & HigherEd

title: The Impact of Generative AI on Higher Education Assessment
description: This research investigates how generative AI tools are changing assessment practices in higher education. It explores both the challenges posed by tools like ChatGPT and the opportunities for new forms of authentic assessment.
categories: Current AI Use and Perceptions in PK 12 & HigherEd

title: AI Skills in the Workforce: Employer Expectations and Educational Alignment
description: This comprehensive survey of employers across industries identifies the AI skills most in demand and evaluates how well current educational programs are preparing students for AI-augmented careers.

title: Student Performance Analysis with AI-Enhanced Learning Platforms
description: This longitudinal study measures student performance outcomes when using AI-enhanced learning platforms compared to traditional methods. It includes data from 50 schools across diverse socioeconomic settings.

title: AI Policy Development in Educational Institutions
description: This analysis documents the current state of AI usage policies in educational institutions, from K-12 to higher education. It provides a framework for developing comprehensive AI policies that balance innovation with ethical considerations.
categories: Current State of Guidelines, Training, and Policies
